title: Sam Hall-McMaster
text:
Sam Hall-McMaster, PhD







Human intelligence is flexible, but where does this flexibility come from? My research investigates the neural coding schemes and computational algorithms that generate adaptive behaviour. Originally from Aotearoa New Zealand, I completed my PhD at the University of Oxford and am now based at Harvard University.
